`SET NAMES utf8mb4;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0;

â€“ Table structure for admin

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS admin;
CREATE TABLE admin (
admin_id int(0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT â€˜ç®¡ç†å‘˜idâ€™,
admin_name varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ç®¡ç†å‘˜è´¦å·â€™,
admin_password varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯†ç â€™,
admin_state tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT â€˜è´¦å·æ˜¯å¦å°ç¦â€™,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´â€™,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜åˆ é™¤æ—¶é—´â€™,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´â€™,
PRIMARY KEY (admin_id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 11 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

â€“ Table structure for article

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS article;
CREATE TABLE article (
id int(0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT â€˜æ–‡ç« idâ€™,
title varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜æ–‡ç« æ ‡é¢˜â€™,
content mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL COMMENT â€˜æ–‡ç« å†…å®¹â€™,
topping tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT â€˜æ˜¯å¦ç½®é¡¶ï¼ˆ0|1ï¼‰â€™,
admin_id int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¸Šä¼ è€…idâ€™,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜åˆ é™¤æ—¶é—´â€™,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´â€™,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¸Šä¼ æ—¶é—´â€™,
PRIMARY KEY (id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 6 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

â€“ Table structure for booking_info

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS booking_info;
CREATE TABLE booking_info (
site_code int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜åœºåœ°ç¼–å·â€™,
user_id int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜é¢„çº¦çš„ç”¨æˆ·idâ€™,
id_time int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜é¢„çº¦æ—¶é—´å¯¹åº”çš„idç¼–å·â€™,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¸Šä¼ æ—¶é—´â€™,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜åˆ é™¤æ—¶é—´â€™,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´â€™,
version int(0) NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT â€˜ä¹è§‚é”â€™,
PRIMARY KEY (user_id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

â€“ Table structure for booking_time

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS booking_time;
CREATE TABLE booking_time (
site_code int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜åœºåœ°ç¼–å·â€™,
id int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜æ—¶é—´æ®µidâ€™,
time varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜idå¯¹åº”çš„æ—¶é—´æ®µâ€™,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¸Šä¼ æ—¶é—´â€™,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜åˆ é™¤æ—¶é—´â€™,
update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´â€™,
PRIMARY KEY (id) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

â€“ Table structure for site_info

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS site_info;
CREATE TABLE site_info (
site_code int(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜åœºåœ°ç¼–å·â€™,
site_state tinyint(1) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å…¶ä»–æ´»åŠ¨æ­£åœ¨ä¸¾åŠâ€™,
create_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¸Šä¼ æ—¶é—´â€™,

) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

â€“ Table structure for user

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user;
CREATE TABLE user (
user_id int(0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT â€˜ç”¨æˆ·idâ€™,
user_name varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ç”¨æˆ·è´¦å·â€™,
user_password varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜ç”¨æˆ·å¯†ç â€™,

update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT â€˜ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´â€™,
delete_time datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT â€˜åˆ é™¤æ—¶é—´â€™,

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
